title: A Bird in a Cage and a Tin of Paint
description: 66,000 words. A heart rendering true tale of the early years of a young boy growing up in post war Manchester with a single parent who suffered mental health issues and his fight against an educational system that did not understand his disability, Dyslexia. It takes you from his traumatic birth through the break up of his parents marriage to how he coped by escaping from the cruelty both at home and at school. It is easy to read but also at times a very difficult read. Web site available at https://abirdinacage.wordpress.com/ for readers who have issues with the difficulties raised in the book.
author: Chris    Stewart
